verbs.description: Throughout the nation Tuesday , the collective protest against the Trump administration ’s policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: children] [ARG2: from their families] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] reached fever pitch .

[ARGM-LOC: Throughout the nation] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] , [ARG0: the collective protest against the Trump administration ’s policy of separating children from their families at the border] [V: reached] [ARG1: fever pitch] .
